name: Quantum (Turtlemouse28)
description:
PLAY IN FULL SCREEN (the browser cropping is odd).

This is a very primitive version of a potential platformer puzzle game that involves bending physics.  Currently there are more bugs than levels, but I hope it is still fun to play.

Eventually, I might add time travel / time bending mechanics but that likely won't happen in the near future.

All feedback is appreciated as this game is still early in development and I would love to improve it further.

Thanks for playing!
